DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate clinical outcome 30-day mortality on-pump CABG .
DOC.brief_title: AKIN Criteria : Acute Kidney Injury After On-Pump Coronary Artery Bypass Graft ( CABG )
DOC.detailed_description: Eight hundred seventeen patient enrolled series divide group : Group AKI ( - ) - patient without acute kidney injury on-pump CABG . Group AKI ( + ) - patient acute kidney injury on-pump CABG . AKI define absolute increase serum creatinine ( SCr ) equal 0.3 mg/dl ( ≥ 26.4 μmol/l ) percentage increase SCr equal 50 % ( 1.5-fold baseline ) . The change SCr concentration define difference immediate postoperative concentration high concentration stay ICU . Clinical Outcomes 30-day mortality evaluate patient .
DOC.criteria: Patients underwent onpump coronary artery bypass graft Patients least two serum creatinine value within 48 hour . Patients endstage kidney disease require renal replacement therapy .
